item.description: Another hard push at reducing my reading list. At the current pace I may not write many more of these posts.

item.description: Data engineering, adtech, ZIO, Rust, writing, some miscellaneous stuff. Expect a similar wide range in the future as well. You can check all my weekly readings by checking the tag here . You can also get these as a weekly newsletter by subscribing here.
